aircraft.value: Raptor Elite - AC-6195-512 at Training Center Beta

defect_observed.value: Brake system pressure decay. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control Hydraulics component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock

preventive_action.value: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 28/07/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 30/07/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 31/07/2023 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 03/08/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 03/08/2023 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Safety Critical
b) Defect Observed: Brake system pressure decay. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Age-related degradation of elastomeric components
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control Hydraulics component.
Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock

ii. Preventive Action: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type
